Query: search earliest=-6h@h (index=os sourcetype=proftpd* host=try-pciftp* ) (/nap11evfs90/input OR /nap11evfs90/input2 OR  /nap22evfs91/output OR /nap22evfs91/output2) AND TRANSFER_DIRECTION=i | rename LOGIN_NAME AS User | rename BYTES_TRANSFERRED AS Size  | rename XFER_SERVICE AS Method  | rename TRANSFER_FILENAME as FileName | rename _time as Time  | table User Method FileName Time Size

search earliest=-6h@h  sourcetype="t2_app" ritsApplicationCode AND ( changeme ) | xmlkv | rename printJobNumber as JobNumber | rename ritsApplicationCode as AppCode | rename eventClassCode as Platform | eval  PlatformStartTime = strftime(strptime(actualStartTime, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S"),"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" mktime(PlatformStartTime)    | eval  Schedule = strftime(strptime(scheduledStartTime, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S"),"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" mktime(Schedule)  | eval FileName = details.text | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" mktime(PlatformStartTime)  | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" mktime(Schedule) | table JobNumber AppCode dpsAppCode Platform PlatformStartTime Schedule FileName
search earliest=-6h@h sourcetype="moveitc" ( changeme ) | eval  FileName = _raw | eval key=md5(_raw)  | table FileName key
search earliest=-6h@h  sourcetype="senderreceiver" | rename JOBNUMBER as JobNumber | rename _time as Time   |dedup JobNumber | table Time JobNumber DeliveryStatus
search earliest=-6h@h sourcetype="RPDSInput" | table AppCode JobNumber InFileName
